column5: http://www.saultstar.com/ArticleDisplay.aspx?e=1494522  and he told me he was studying !  TB
And he is!  Migratory patterns of steelhead,  Catch and release impact on steelhead, water conditions, and so on  Nice picture
Nice smile,but he sure looks cold.LOL  Hands look like thier froze.
Looks pretty darn cold. Cool to see the story & pic in the paper. One way of checking up on him, I guess...  Mike
As a Sault College fish and wildlife alumni i must say, there's no better way to study.
Great stuff, although it looks like the Sault needs a photographer.
I was wondering about that!  The Sault Star normally has decent photography.
Maybe they were going for something artsy.
to me it just looks like maybe it was taken on a point and shoot!
Pa is proud, Pikeie too, and both rightly so.  Plenty o' hat, I see.  What's next?
